programme.title: Shotgun Slade
programme.desc: Slade is transporting an embezzler when train robbers release his prisoner.

programme.title: Shotgun Slade
programme.desc: A rancher whose foreman is murdered asks Slade for help.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: A crook is mistakenly given cash designated for the construction of a clinic.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: The owner of a gun used to kill a rancher protests his innocence.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: Roy and Dale discover the body of a murdered Indian chief.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: The Mingo Kid swaps clothes with Roy, who is then taken hostage by another outlaw.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show
programme.desc: Dale unknowingly buys a stove containing stolen payroll money from a local peddler (Dub Taylor).

programme.title: Buckskin Frontier
programme.desc: A railroad man (Richard Dix) falls for the daughter (Jane Wyatt) of a wagon freighter (Lee J. Cobb) who will not let him through.

programme.title: Saddle Serenade
programme.desc: During an ambush that has been staged for the amusement of new arrivals to the Vista Grande dude ranch, Tom Logan, a U.S. Marshal posing as one of the ranch's cowhands, is shot and killed by an unseen assailant.

programme.title: Gun Smoke
programme.desc: U.S. marshals trail crooks seeking buried Indian treasure at an archaeological site.

programme.title: Angel and the Badman
programme.desc: A Quaker (Gail Russell) and her family reform a wounded outlaw (John Wayne) who has a killer on his trail.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Two British socialites find that they still have a lot to learn when they visit their friends, the Cartwrights.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Two traildrivers are shanghaied shortly after the Ponderosa cattle herd arrives in San Francisco.

programme.title: 26 Men
programme.desc: Travis goes after escaped con Cain Devers, a bank robber and counterfeiter who is using his counterfeit plates as part of a plot to destroy his father and younger brother.

programme.title: 26 Men
programme.desc: When a Ranger suddenly resigns without explanation, Rynning discovers that the man is hiding a secret.

programme.title: 26 Men
programme.desc: The wife of a preacher who recently established a mission for Apaches living near Gaheyville receives a suspicious telegram and fears her husband has been murdered; Travis learns the truth.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Matt and Margaret investigate the kidnapping of banker Penrose from a stagecoach; they immediately suspect noted bandit Milt Sharp who recently escaped from a Nevada prison and his partner Dutch; a showdown takes place at the Penrose home.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Matt and Margaret investigate when a railroad payroll worth $25,000 is stolen.

programme.title: Fury
programme.desc: During a drought, Joey becomes a junior ranger and tries to protect a couple of hunters from starting a forest fire.

programme.title: Fury
programme.desc: Fury keeps running off to be with a white mare; Joey gets in trouble when he tries to solve the relationship.

programme.title: Fury
programme.desc: Fury is missing.

programme.title: Fury
programme.desc: A man claiming to be Joey's father shows up at the ranch.

programme.title: Fury
programme.desc: A stranger claims to be Joey's father, and threatens to take the boy away from Jim and Fury.

programme.title: Fury
programme.desc: Joey and Frankie Watson both enter lambs in the 4-H Club Livestock Show.

programme.title: Fury
programme.desc: At a junior rodeo, a competitor underhandedly switches horses with Joey.

programme.title: Fury
programme.desc: Bank robbers hide their ill-gotten gains at a local ghost town.

programme.title: Fury
programme.desc: A man on the run from the law takes a job at the ranch, but when he's discovered he must decide whether to flee or stay and help Fury.

programme.title: The Silver Range
programme.desc: Range detectives Johnny Bronton and Tucson Smith are out to trap and bring to justice a band of smugglers who have been bringing silver across the Mexican border illegally.

programme.title: Trigger Fingers
programme.desc: Valley rustlers frame a G-man (Tim McCoy) who is posing as a Gypsy.

programme.title: The Star Packer
programme.desc: Marshal John Travers investigates the murder of a town's sheriff, makes it his mission to restore order to the town and bring down a bandit called the Shadow.

programme.title: The Trail Beyond
programme.desc: Rod Drew (John Wayne) is asked to search for missing people in Canada, and quickly finds out a gang of French Canadian outlaws have been kidnapping people.

programme.title: Kenny Rogers as the Gambler
programme.desc: An Old West poker player (Kenny Rogers) acquires a sidekick (Bruce Boxleitner) and sets out to help the son he never knew.

programme.title: Red Headed Stranger
programme.desc: Revisionist western about fallen preacher Shay, who guns down his wife Raysha for running off with another man. Wandering, he meets single mom Laurie; however, helpless sheriff Scoby wants Shay to help him fight the villainous Clavers.
